Class SubwindowController

java.lang.Object
com.tablr.subwindow.SubwindowController
public class SubwindowController extends Object
Manages the lifecycle and behavior of subwindows in the application. Provides functionality for adding, removing, focusing, and rendering subwindows.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    SubwindowController(AppController appController)
    Constructs a SubwindowController instance.

    • SubwindowController

      public SubwindowController(AppController appController)
      Constructs a SubwindowController instance.
      Parameters:
      appController - The application controller that mediates interactions.

  • Method Details

    • addSubWindow

      public void addSubWindow(Subwindow sub)
      Adds a subwindow to the controller and sets it as focused.
      Parameters:
      sub - The subwindow to add.

    • updateTableAreas

      public void updateTableAreas(int id)
      Updates the table areas of subwindows with the specified table ID.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the table to update.

    • removeSubWindow

      public void removeSubWindow(Subwindow subwindow)
      Removes a subwindow from the controller. If the removed subwindow was focused, the next freshest subwindow is focused.
      Parameters:
      subwindow - The subwindow to remove.

    • closeAllSubwindowsForTable

      public void closeAllSubwindowsForTable(int tableId)
      Closes all subwindows that are currently associated with the specified table ID.
      Parameters:
      tableId - the ID of the table for which all associated subwindows should be closed

    • closeRowsSubwindowIfOpen

      public void closeRowsSubwindowIfOpen(int tableId)
      Checks if rowssubwindows are open for a certain table and closes them.
      Parameters:
      tableId - | ID of table we want to check for.

    • getMediator

      public AppController getMediator()
      Retrieves the application controller mediator.
      Returns:
      The application controller.

    • paint

      public void paint(Graphics g)
      Paints all subwindows managed by the controller.
      Parameters:
      g - The Graphics object used for rendering.

      public void onControlEnter()
      Handles the Control+Enter key event for the focused subwindow.

    • windowActivationMouseEvent

      public void windowActivationMouseEvent(int x, int y, BiConsumer<Subwindow,int[]> event)
      Handles mouse events to activate a subwindow and perform an action.
      Parameters:
      x - The x-coordinate of the mouse event.
      y - The y-coordinate of the mouse event.
      event - The action to perform on the subwindow.

    • tryToggleAllowsBlank

      public boolean tryToggleAllowsBlank(int tableId, int columnId, boolean nextBlank)
      Attempts to toggle the "allows blank" setting for a column in a table.
      Parameters:
      tableId - The ID of the table.
      columnId - The ID of the column.
      nextBlank - The new "allows blank" setting.
      Returns:
      True if the operation was successful, false otherwise.
